ISSUE.TITLE: Wierd URL stuff
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: If I go to http://drone.io/shadowfacts/EnFusion, everything works perfectly fine. But if I go to http://drone.io/shadowfacts/EnFusion/ I get a 404 page not found error. The second URL should work as well.
